Description:
"Behind every small library is a human being." In this powerful message, Log4j maintainer Christian Grobmeier shares the three most crucial lessons he learned from the Log4Shell crisis. It's a call for community, continuous learning, and kindness in open source.

#Log4Shell #Log4j #OpenSource

Title: 3 crucial lessons every developer should learn from Log4Shell
Author: GitHub
